svg.script: var xmlns = "http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"; var xlinkns = "http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"; var box = {left:20, top: 50, right: 320, bottom: 350 }; if (location.search.match('small=1')) { box = {left:20, top: 50, right: 120, bottom: 150 }; } document.documentElement.ondragstart = function() { return false; }; var pointsIn = location.search.match(/p=(.*?)($|&)/)[1]; // don't show a piece of control path between P2 and P3 var hideMiddleControlPath = location.search.match('nocpath=1'); pointsIn = pointsIn.split(','); var points = []; // read points from ?p=... for(var i=0; i<pointsIn.length; i++) { var x = box.left + (box.right - box.left)*pointsIn[i]; var y = box.bottom + (box.top - box.bottom)*pointsIn[++i]; points.push( {x: x, y: y} ); } var bezierPath = document.getElementById("bezier-path"); var controlPath = document.getElementById("control-path"); //controlPath.style.display = location.search.match('nocpath=1') ? 'none' : 'block'; var runButton = document.getElementById("run-button"); runButton.parentNode.style.display = location.search.match('animate=1') ? 'block' : 'none'; var tPathTemplate = document.getElementById("t-path-template"); tPathTemplate.parentNode.removeChild(tPathTemplate); function drawPath() { var letter; switch (points.length) { case 4: letter = 'C'; break; case 3: letter = 'Q'; break; default: letter = 'L'; } var bezierPathD = "M" + points[0].x + ',' + points[0].y + ' '+letter; var controlPathD = "M" + points[0].x + ',' + points[0].y + ' L'; for(var i = 1; i < points.length; i++) { bezierPathD += points[i].x + ',' + points[i].y + ' '; controlPathD += points[i].x + ',' + points[i].y + ' '; } bezierPath.setAttribute('d', bezierPathD); controlPath.setAttribute('d', controlPathD); function dist(a,b) { return Math.round(Math.sqrt( (a.x-b.x)*(a.x-b.x) + (a.y-b.y)*(a.y-b.y))); } if (hideMiddleControlPath) { controlPath.setAttribute('stroke-dasharray', dist(points[0],points[1])+' '+dist(points[1],points[2])+' 9999 9999'); } } // draw control points function drawPoints(points) { var p = document.getElementById('p-template'); p.removeAttribute('id'); p.parentNode.removeChild(p); for(var i=0; i<points.length; i++) { var point = p.cloneNode(true); point.getElementsByTagName('text')[0].firstChild.data = i+1; setPointCoords(point, i); setPointHandler(point, i); document.documentElement.appendChild(point); } } // control points coords are shifted from Left-Upper corner a bit // to give them space to render function setPointCoords(point, i) { point.setAttribute('x', points[i].x-20); point.setAttribute('y', points[i].y-20); } function setPointHandler(point, i) { var circle = point.getElementsByTagName('circle')[0]; circle.onmousedown = function() { document.onmousemove = function(e) { var x = e.pageX, y = e.pageY; // constrain withing the box if (x < box.left) x = box.left; if (x > box.right) x = box.right; if (y > box.bottom) y = box.bottom; if (y < box.top) y = box.top; points[i].x = x; points[i].y = y; setPointCoords(point, i); drawPath(); } document.onmouseup = function() { document.onmousemove = document.onmouseup = null; } return false; } } // draw point connectors which form the curve function drawT(points, t) { var path = document.getElementById('t-'+points.length); if (!path) { path = tPathTemplate.cloneNode(true); path.setAttribute('stroke', ["blue","#0a0","red"][points.length % 3]); path.setAttribute('id', 't-'+points.length); document.documentElement.appendChild(path); } var subPoints = []; var x = points[0].x + (points[1].x - points[0].x)*t; var y = points[0].y + (points[1].y - points[0].y)*t; var tPathD = "M" + x + ',' + y + ' L'; subPoints.push({x: x, y: y}); for(var i=1; i<points.length-1; i++) { var x = points[i].x + (points[i+1].x - points[i].x)*t; var y = points[i].y + (points[i+1].y - points[i].y)*t; subPoints.push({x: x, y: y}); tPathD += x + ',' + y + ' '; } if (points.length <= 3) { var m = document.getElementById('marker'); if (t == 1) { var mx = -10, my = -10; } else { mx = subPoints[0].x + (x-subPoints[0].x)*t; my = subPoints[0].y + (y-subPoints[0].y)*t; } m.setAttribute('cx', mx); m.setAttribute('cy', my); path.setAttribute('stroke-width', 2); } if (points.length == 2) { // only 2 points provided, special case tPathD = "M"+points[0].x+","+points[0].y+" L"+x+","+y; } path.setAttribute('d', tPathD); if (subPoints.length > 2){ drawT(subPoints, t); } } var t = 0; var timer; // animate the curve function animate(complete) { timer = setInterval(function() { if (t>1) { t = 1; } //bezierPath.setAttribute('stroke-dasharray', t*bezierPath.getTotalLength()+' '+bezierPath.getTotalLength()); drawT(points, t); document.getElementById('t-value').firstChild.nodeValue = t==0 ? 0 : t == 1 ? 1 : t.toFixed(3); /* if (t >= 0.5) { clearInterval(timer); runButton.parentNode.style.display = 'none'; return; } */ if (t == 1) { clearInterval(timer); timer = 0; complete && complete(); return; } t += 0.005; }, 30); } function animationDone() { for(var i=1; i<=points.length; i++) { var path = document.getElementById('t-'+i); path && document.documentElement.removeChild(path); } t = 0; runButton.setAttributeNS(xlinkns, 'xlink:href', 'play.png'); } runButton.onclick = onAnimate; function onAnimate() { if (timer) { // animation in action runButton.setAttributeNS(xlinkns, 'xlink:href', 'play.png'); clearInterval(timer); timer = 0; return; } runButton.setAttributeNS(xlinkns, 'xlink:href', 'pause.png'); animate(animationDone) } drawPath(); drawPoints(points); //
